ygData.subject: RE: Clarity and song/spell stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not that I m aware of.  But I m not certain how the server handles dual nature effects.  Is 100% slowdown stronger than 30% slowdown with movement
ygData.messageBody:
> I'll have to test it again with my enchanter friend (or anyone
> else here can if they have the time). Stronger effects are
> supposed to override weaker ones, and weaker ones aren't
> supposed to take hold over stronger ones. Maybe the shaman
> drowsy spells are bugged in this regard. Do they do anything
> except slow down the mob?

Not that I'm aware of. But I'm not certain how the server handles
dual nature effects. Is 100% slowdown stronger than 30% slowdown
with movement reduction? Along the same lines as, is movement
reduction (snare) stronger than 30% slowdown and minor movement
reduction. I'm just not sure, without extensive testing.

Harmonic.
